sentence.Network_en: Erwin pads along carpeted corridor. He reaches Blatter's door, knocks and waits for the call.
sentence.Network_cn: 欧文沉重地走过铺着地毯的过道,来到布拉特办公室的门口, 敲门,等着老大叫他进去.

sentence.Network_en: With luck EU labour law will stop Mr Blatter and keep it that way.
sentence.Network_cn: 幸好,欧盟的劳动法案会阻止巴特勒,让英国联赛保持现状.

sentence.Network_en: Blatter was vehement in his opposition last week, so Scudamore has his work cut out.
sentence.Network_cn: 布拉特上周表达了反对意见, 所以斯库达莫尔中断了自己的工作.

PerfectNetExp.abs: blatherskite 听无聊话的人blatter 滔滔不绝blaze a trail 开辟道路
blatt =blatterblatter 平推断层blatthaller 平坦活塞式薄膜扬声器
blatant喧哗的，明显的blatter滔滔不绝得说blandishment 奉承n
blaze 燃烧 blazon 精确描绘blatter 大声快说botch 弄坏 blotch 大斑点

list.abs: 还有德薛拉与世足总会主席布莱特（Sepp Blatter）之间未说出口的默契：只要由巴西筹备世界杯，德薛拉答应再等8年才角逐布莱特 …
要是你不是布拉特（Sepp Blatter），并且还有一点点脑子的话，你就不会反对这条建议。真不知道我们还要等多久才能在球场上看到 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: originally Scots, of imitative origin

auth_sentence.content: Blatter then pledged to clean up and reform FIFA in his final term.
